title: Maha Mantra
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Indian, Buffet, Delivery, Take-out
description: Located in a cozy house in the Vila Madalenas neighborhood offers Indians masalas flavors. Everyday they have a buffet of organic, natural, and fresh ingredients. Some of the specialties are puri (Indian bread), chutneys, chapatis, dhals, organic salads, and fresh juices. Also offers organic products for sale.
